menuItemTitle.description: Creative title of the menu item

menuItemLongDescription.description: Detailed description of the menu item

reasons.description: List of reasons why this menu item is a good choice for the user

nutrition.description: Nutritional information for the menu item

appliedCustomizations.description: List of customizations already applied to this menu item

availableCustomizations.description: List of available customizations for this menu item. The title should be verbs such as (Add Cheese, etc)

redoModifiers.description: List of modifiers for re-generating the menu item (e.g. More Protein, Less Sugar)

Reason.description: Description about why this menu customization is a good choice for the user

title.description: Title of the reason (start with a relevant emoji)

description.description: Explanation about how this customization helps the user reach their dietary goals

estimated.description: Whether the nutritional information is estimated or exact

type.description: Type of customization (e.g. Add, Remove, Substitute, etc)

ingredient.description: Name of the ingredient (e.g. Cheese, Turkey, Mushroom). Starts with a relevant emoji if possible

reason.description: Short description of why this customization is a good choice for the user's dietary goals

substituted.description: Optional. If type is 'Substitute', this is the name of the ingredient being substituted

nutritionDifference.description: Nutritional information difference caused by the customization. Values may be negative if the customization reduces the nutritional content
